TEXT.S: Ludja i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Ludja. u kasalumaluma' nu Ludja sa, 42 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 184 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 175 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 9 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 93%, Amis 1%, Bunun 1%.
